title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Comparative Analysis of Science Textbook Design: Simulation-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three structural differences (activity distribution, thematic organization) between Egyptian/Chinese science textbooks
Learners can propose at least one strategy for linking learning objectives-activities-assessments when designing textbook units using VR simulation tools
By applying horizontal analysis methodology, learners can derive at least two ideas for improving the design of other subject (mathematics) textbooks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
